name: Gravity Star Monkey: Moon Surfers - Little Space Pet Adventure (Free Game)
name_original: Gravity Star Monkey: Moon Surfers - Little Space Pet Adventure (Free Game)
description:
Steer silly sci-fi monkeys up and down the mountains on the Moon! Gravity Star Monkey: Moon Surfers is a physics based slide and fly. Swipe your finger across the screen to give these UFO monkeys the speed they need to escape the moon’s gravity and collect bonus cosmic debris. If you tap at the right time, the higher they go and the bigger the prizes! Free and Fun!

Very Addicting!

Features:
Exciting Endless Gameplay
Tons of Fun Monkeys!
Climb the Highest Peaks and Speed Down Moon Valleys!
developers: Sizzle Entertainment: The Best Fun Free Cool Apps and Top Addicting Games
publishers: SIZZLE ENTERTAINMENT: THE BEST FUN FREE COOL APPS AND TOP ADDICTING GAMES
